JOB RESPONSIBILITIES

demand

Prepared Daily Chiller Report

Charging the system with refrigerants
YEARS WORK EXPERIENCE IN COMPUTER OPERATOR

Computer Operator in Dubai BIN Laden 2013 to 2016.
